reviewText:
My 3 year old son absolutely LOVES this DVD.  We borrowed it from the library (he picked it out), and I'm wondering now if I'll need to buy it (or just keep borrowing it), because he wants to watch it over and over and over.

It is so simple - just a bunch of trucks, tractors, construction equipment, etc. driving around doing what they do, to some goofy music.  It's gotta be one of the cheapest made DVDs I've ever watched, but highly entertaining for my heavy equipment loving little boy.

My grandson throughly enjoyed this DVD. He is a big fan of trucks
and this was a great movie which kept him engrossed the entire
time.
Well what 7 yr old boy wouldn't just love a DVD about trucks? This guys son loves this DVD and watches it ALL the time.
Perfect for our 4 year old that LOVES trucks.  I believe it's 90 minutes long and he is glued to every second.
I understand from my niece that this dvd keeps the little one quite occupied.  He has not gotten bored with it.

This movie is good, but not different enough from the original to make it worth owning both. The music is "better" in the first and it only has 1 section of remote control cars. This one has a bigger segment on remote control vehicles which is not very interesting.

I bought this video along with Lots and Lots of Trucks, Volume 1.

My 29 month old is OBESSSED. The songs are catchy, the videos are great. It shows real trucks with the sounds, also while having music in the background only sometimes. Its the perfect mix... and he cannot look away. We watch them constantly... and honestly i think its better than the wiggles all the time lol.

I also bought the Mighty Machines videos, and i gotta say he doesnt like them. at all. When i play them he gets mad and demands this one lol.

If you have a little one obsessed with trucks, than look no further.

I had ordered this for my grandson and was very disappointed in it.  It is nothing but songs and trucks and that is not what I expected when ordering this product.  I have attempted to send same back along with lots and lots of trucks vol 1.  both do not meet my expectations nor my grandson who is 7 years and and he even said "grandma you have wasted your money."  So I am attempting to return same if I could.
I bought 2 of the DVDs in this series for my almost-3-year-old. He likes them. The theme music is catchy and has gotten stuck in my head! Would recommend for any truck-lover.
Disk doesn't work, disappointing my child Christmas morning isn't what I had in mind. Won't send it back will cost too much.

My two year old son LOVES this DVD.  The theme song is catchy and exciting and different trucks are constantly going across the screen.  It isn't an educational DVD like some of the others I have purchased.  This is perfect for a two year old who just wants to see a LOT of trucks.

This is a great video describing the contents of one of the award-winning children's series Lots and Lots of ... DVDs. Just Search for LOTS AND LOTS OF and you'll see the entire DVD series including: LOTS AND LOTS AND LOTS OF FIRE TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Fire Trucks DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF MONSTER TRUCKS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks DVD Vol. 1 MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD SET MONSTER TRUCK CLASSICS 3 DVD Set LOTS AND LOTS OF TRAINS VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of Trains DVD Vol 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF TOY TRAINS AND MODEL RAILORADS VOL. 1 Lots and Lots of Toy Trains and Model Railroads Volume 1 DVD Movie LOTS AND LOTS OF JETS AND PLANES VOL.1, VOL.2 AND VOL.3 Lots and Lots of JETS and PLANES DVD Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF CARS, MONSTER TRUCKS AND HIGH SPEED RACERS VOL.1 Lots and Lots of Fast Cars, Monster Trucks and High Speed Racers Vol 1 DVD - Extreme Motorsports LOTS AND LOTS OF TRUCKS VOL.1 AND VOL.2 Lots and Lots of Trucks Vol. 1 LOTS AND LOTS OF PLAYFUL PENGUINS Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins & Their Toe-Tappin Feet -All About Penguins DVD LOTS AND LOTS OF PENGUINS IN THE WILD Lots and Lots of Penguins In The Wild DVD These are all award-winning DVDs that make great gifts for kids of all ages and are not available in stores so order here! Kids with autism love them too because they contain lots of action shots and fun, sing-a-long music from award-winning children's musician James Coffey. ALSO SEARCH FOR OTHER DVDS, BOOKS AND CDS FROM MARSHALL PUBLISHING INCLUDING: TV's Greatest Game Shows Book and DVD; TV's Greatest Comedians; Lots and Lots of Fire Safety Tips and Songs; ALL ABOARD The Legends of the Rails - The exciting history of passenger trains in America!; The Complete History of America's Railroads.
The video quality is pretty low, but my 3 year old enjoyed watching.
Kids love, love, love, this book. Even the girls ! Definitely a favorite.
Garbage it skips and footage is from 80s-90s

We couldn't watch this for more than ten minutes without getting nauseous. The camera cuts are so quick and incoherent they made us dizzy. I kept waiting for it to "begin." But the same style intro song seen on the commercial (you can check it out on youtube) runs through the entire video. We never watched it again. My two and a half year old just sat through it dazed never smiling. Mighty Machines is much more enjoyable.
My grandson loves Georgie. We are never disappointed
Amazing DVD! Keeps my son totally captivated. The music is tame and catchy; not at all annoying. Definitely a favorite in our house! I highly recommend this video.

My grandson (3 yo) is obsessed with trucks and he watches volumes one and two incessantly.  Only complaint is from parents that the song is starting to drive them nuts.  It's good to be a grandparent.
My grandson, age 2, loves it!
really good dvd of trucks.  our son adores trucks and this video makes for hours of watching and good clean fun

I have an 8 year old with autism and he absolutely loves these videos because they are real-life, not animated.  They are so realistic with all of the sights and sounds that he gets totally absorbed.  There is not a ridiculous amount of narration as in some others we own, so you really get to hear the sounds of life with those trucks.  Highly recommend!
